actions.name: Purity Aura
actions.description: Effect: The user and all allies in range that possess an [Aura] Ability take 30% reduced damage from Super Effective hits.

actions.name: Purity Aura
actions.description: Passive: The Power of the user's Attacks is reduced by 25%, and the user heals 2 Ticks of HP at the end of their Activations.
